title: What Halo's Delay Means for Series X's Launch - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.12.20
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about what Halo Infinite's delay means for Xbox Series X launch, Control's PS5/Series X upgrade fiasco, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:02 - Housekeeping
Tim and Barrett’s First Impressions of Tony Hawk 1+2 Remake are up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast feeds!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:10:46 - Halo Delayed, Xbox Series X Coming in November
00:37:20 - Control PS5/Series X Upgrade Locked to Special Edition, Mathew Olson @ USGamer
00:41:08 - Why is my purchase of the game and extra content not good enough for Remedy snd 505 Games?  - Best Friends Q:Kala
00:44:45 - Are you willing to rebuy Control for the next gen boost? - Best Friends Q:Grezick
00:46:54 - Gary, was Amy Hennig’s Star Wars game going to be the best Star Wars Game ever? Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:52:40 -  QUIP
00:54:07 -  KLARNA
00:55:23 - Out today
01:00:08 - Squad Up:Chenardizzle(PS4) - Chenardizzle
01:00:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Greg
